jcr:content.jcr:title: SalesForce API
jcr:content.description: Salesforce.com is the enterprise cloud computing company that is leading the shift to the Social Enterprise.
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: The Force.com platform is the world's first Platform as a Service (PaaS), enabling developers to create and deliver any kind of business application in the cloud, entirely on-demand and without software
